TopicTitle: Following Mods on Spacedock not working

Articles.Content: Does anyone know why the follow button on spacedock doesn't show up anymore, even though mods still have followers listed?

I am still unable to follow mods on spacedock, does anyone have any ideas?

 

Just noticed that it seems to be only in Chrome that the follow button doesn't show up, it is there in IE. However, I don't use IE, just as I assume nearly nobody does anymore..

IE tab doesn't seem to help. This is rather frustrating....anyone have a fix?
